newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatia Airlines starts daily flights to Sarajevo.
newsitem.headline: Croatia Airlines starts daily flights to Sarajevo.

text.p: Croatian carrier Croatia Airlines started scheduled daily flights from Zagreb to Bosnian capital Sarajevo on October 1, the company said in a press release on Tuesday.
It was flying to Sarajevo at 1340 local time (1140 GMT) with departure on return at 1500 (1300 GMT) on October 6, 13 and 20.
The flight will depart Zagreb at 1255 (1055 GMT) on October 6, returning at 1415 (1215 GMT).
Departure on all other days up to October 26, when Croatia switches to a new winter timetable, is scheduled for 1225 (1025 GMT) with return at 1445 (1234 GMT).
Changes for the winter timetable are to be announced later, the company said.
